argument.name: word_list_to_add
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of words. Character

page.description: Add a CR-LF delimted list of words to the User-defined spellchecker dictionary.
page.discussion: The USER_DICTIONARY_ADD() function adds a CR-LF delimited list of words to the user dictionary for the Spellchecker. Limitations: Desktop applications only. The user_dict.txt file must exist before using this function. You can create it with A5_EDIT_USER_DICTIONARY().
page.example: dim lst as C lst = rock pebble stone %str% ? user_dictionary_add(lst)
